text:
- Liberty Mutual is a
global insurance company.

We need to be there specifically
whenever people need us.

And that's why we want to
be building new applications
to make it easy for all these interactions
at any point in time.
We've built a couple of things.

The first one is we built
a serverless call center
and this can automatically process a claim

in less than four minutes
after a natural disaster.
The other side of the coin,
we built a serverless developer platform

that has been successful
enough that we've deployed

over three and a half
thousand serverless platforms
in the last year through it.

We want to spend most of our
time focusing on our customer

and taking advantage on the
best capabilities out there

whilst not taking on
undifferentiated heavy lifting.

Whenever I say we built
a serverless call center
that can automatically process a claim
in under four minutes,

that means that you don't
need to sit waiting on hold

for 60, 90 minutes
waiting on a call center.

You don't need to look
up all these details.

We just have it all
sitting there in the system
so that you can just phone up or text

and say, "I need to make
a claim, this is me."
And it goes through seamlessly

and you can get back to
doing the important thing
which is piecing your life back together.
